name: Ant Escape: Ant Adventure, Free Game, Funny
name_original: Ant Escape: Ant Adventure, Free Game, Funny
description:
Description:
During the journey to discover the world outside, an ant was get lost in the world monsters-frogs. It’s high time for you to use all of your skills to put him out of the kingdom of monsters-frog brutality.

Gameplay:

TOUCH the screen to help the frog out of the maze and evil jaws.
-TOUCH the screen to move the car foward
-Keep a safe distance from the ant to the evils
-DON’T HIT any obstacles
-Keep a safe distance behind every obstacle ahead

Features:
-Integrated Rankings
-Integrated Leaderboards
-Integrated Facebook
Ant Escape bring to you a relaxing moment with friends, relatives anytime, anywhere!
